thread.title: Al M
thread.title_full: Monex Deposit Company reviewed by Al M

author: Al M
title: Al M
text: Dean Smith would check in with me about every other month and never tried to pressure me to purchase. When I was ready to buy gold, I knew Dean and Monex would be the people I would call. And just I was led to believe, their service was smooth and easy. Delivery was prompt. When I'm ready to buy more precious metals, I know who to call.
